title: Episode 59: That Great Little Man
description:
We examine the early career of Horatio Nelson, one of Napoleon's ablest and most implacable opponents. Nelson had good connections and showed great promise, but his temperament endangered his career almost as soon as it began.

Visit: https://www.patreon.com/ageofnapoleon to sign up for the ad-free version.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
